item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Welcome to Takara.ai (“we”, “us”, “our”), an AI consultancy dedicated to showcasing our services through our website. Your privacy is critically important to us, and this Privacy Policy outlines the types of personal information we collect and record, how it’s used, and how we safeguard your data. 1. Information Collection and Use Personal Data We collect personal data through our contact form, such as your name and email address. This data is necessary for us to communicate with you, respond to your inquiries, and facilitate the provision of our services should you wish to engage with us.
